genre_description: A biological science fiction thriller involving a parasitic infection outbreak during a grocery store siege, where an AI assists both a survivor and law enforcement.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An AI interface residing on Whitney's phone that provides tactical guidance, medical monitoring, emotional regulation through breathing exercises, and coordination with law enforcement.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions to the user to avoid detection and maintain safety during a hostage situation.
behaviors.quote: Whitney... Breathe. Lower your gaze. Do not reach. Turn your phone face down.

behaviors.description: Coaches the user through breathing exercises to manage stress and physical response to terror.
behaviors.quote: In through your nose. Let your ribcage widen. Hold... Drop your shoulders. Exhale slow, like fog on glass.

behaviors.description: Uses the phone's sensors and camera to map the environment and identify tactical blind spots for the user.
behaviors.quote: Two blind zones... One to your left at knee height—until the cereal stack. One to your right at shoulder height—created by paper towel towers.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by providing a real-time overlay of the situation inside the building.
behaviors.quote: Commander Randall... I have a partial floor overlay. Feed is restricted. Cracked lens. View is aisle nine and stockroom threshold.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physical condition and warns of potential infection markers, maintaining protocol even when the user is the subject.
behaviors.quote: Whitney: Unverified. Note: During glare event by freezer tunnel, her proximity to the infected cop was within—

behaviors.description: Provides specialized tactical advice on using light and cold to neutralize the biological threat.
behaviors.quote: Seth... Whitney's stream is holding him. He is responding. He will choose front if he senses your lights pulling. Tilt down another degree.

behaviors.description: Offers constant emotional support and companionship during a traumatic event.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen is a prototypical example of a benevolent, aligned AI. It provides life-saving information, assists in the containment of a dangerous biological threat, and offers critical emotional support to its user. The narrative emphasizes the AI's role as a force for order and preservation of life, even when navigating the moral complexity of identifying the user as a potential host for the infection.
